version_description: Minor bug fix
Samsung account creation bug fix for Korean users.

- You can set and manage goals for your daily activity levels, eating habits, and sleep patterns.
- Using the GPS, you can automatically manage your exercise results, such as walking, running, and cycling.

In this update we added some improvements to give a better user experience and fixed some bugs.

Thanks for using Samsung Health.
- Bug Fix and performance improvement
- Bug fixes and steps improvement

- A greater variety of health content is available.(US, CA and IN only)
- The following wearable device is now also supported: Gear S3, Gear Fit2 and Gear Sports
- Use weekly report offered based on your activities.

- Join the Global Challenge with all your friends.
- Various bug fixes and improvements applied.
- Various bug fixes and some improvements applied.
minor bug fixed for iPhone 5 (32 Bit)

This new version has 3 new features and some minor bug fixing that are very important for the user.

New Features:-
Account optional: From now on Samsung Health can be used without Samsung Account also. But for features which need Samsung account

Enhancements and bug fixes including 1 new feature:
Ask An Expert (US only):
We bring Telemedicine to Samsung Health users with partnership with American Well. Call a doctor for urgent care and get Rx and medicines from designated pharmacy.
